means: 从…卸下马来，使摔下马来，推翻( unhorse的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She was unhorsed by fences, laws and alien taboos.
sentence.Network_cn: 她被藩蓠 、 法律及外来的戒律赶下了马.

sentence.Network_en: The two knights tilted until one was unhorsed.
sentence.Network_cn: 两位骑士跃马横枪厮杀到一块儿,直到其中的一个最终被刺下马来.

sentence.Network_en: Men were bewildered by politicians, bankers and business - men, and unhorsed by fences, laws and alien taboos.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们被政客, 银行家及实业家搞得手足无措, 被藩篱.法律以及外来的戒律赶下了马.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U1)|无忧教育 ... unhoped-for 出乎意料 unhorse 推翻 unhouse 赶出家去.
新概念英语四册课堂笔记&nbsp;Lesson&nbsp;26... ... accustomed to 做后置定语 unhorsed 放弃戎马生涯 overcame 击退.

auth_sentence.content: From becoming unhorsed, it probably only took a matter of a few minutes, before he was dead - not a long time at all.
auth_sentence.res_content: From becoming unhorsed, it probably only took a matter of a few minutes, before he was dead - not a long time at all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: From becoming unhorsed, it probably only took a matter of a few minutes, before he was dead - not a long time at all.
